Title: Includes the impersonation of a doctor of medicine as criminal impersonation in the second degree
Summary: Includes the impersonation of a doctor of medicine as criminal impersonation in the second degree, regardless of whether a person suffers harm from the medical advice or treatment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to including the impersonation of a doctor of medicine as criminal impersonation in the second degree
